name: Bitwarden_rs-git_store
description: Bitwardenrs on Heroku with git backend store

BACKUP_DB_REPO_URL.description: git repo to store database, please fork https://github.com/std2main/example-bitwarden_rs-data.git

BACKUP_FILE_REPO_URL.description: git repo to store attachments, please fork https://github.com/std2main/example-bitwarden_rs-file.git

BACKUP_GIT_SSH_KEY_B64.description: Base64 content for the ssh key to access git repos, get it with 'cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa | base64'

POLLING_BACKUP.description: Disable polling upload changes to repo when not equal true.
